text.text: **Move Contact List** from one group to another
Mumara Campaigns allows changing the group of any list by using the “Move to Another” feature. This way any list can be moved to any of the desired or more suitable group without the hassle.
Use the “Merge into Another” feature of Mumara to merge a contact list into another one. It is a simple feature that makes it easy to move all the contacts from one list to another.
Download invalid and **duplicate contacts** from Import History
View the import history of any contact list and get access to the downloadable files of contacts which were duplicate or invalid at the time of import of that contact list.

Create multiple chunks of a contact list by splitting it into two or more. Splitting a list can be done by defining the number of contacts per list and also by defining just the number of lists which will create the desired number of lists containing equal contacts.
